```{r}
## install packages and read data
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(trend)
library(forecast)
library(tseries)
library(zoo)
library(sf)
library(maps)
Alaska_Data <- read.csv("../DATA/PROCESSED/AlaskaTempPrecipDischarge.csv")
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}

Alaska_Border <- st_as_sf(map(database = "state", plot = TRUE, fill = TRUE, col = "white")) %>%

## create summary dataframe with only site locations
discharge_sites <- Alaska_Data %>%
  group_by(site_no) %>%
  summarize(Bin = first(Bin), )

secchi.spatial <- st_as_sf(secchi.summary, coords = c("long", "lat"), crs = 4326)
```
